Content: The Minister was warmly welcomed by Chairperson of the ITN Thilaka Jayasundera and the top management. Staff of the Organization was also present on the occasion. The Minister ensued a discussion with the Chairperson and the top management, consequently. Addressing the gathering Minister Ruwan Wijewardena said that ITN has been watched by Sri Lankan masses for a long time. He added that his intention is to make ITN the most popular television channel in Sri Lanka and obtain the number one ranking. He noted that the ITN will spread the message of development work done by the government during last four years.
